name: Sawn lumber, hardwood, planed, kiln dried, at planer mill, NE-NC
description:
1. Allocation on a mass basis.
2. Important note: although most of the data in the US LCI database has 
undergone some sort of review, the database as a whole has not yet 
undergone a formal validation process.
3. Please email comments to lci@nrel.gov.                                                                4. WRT soil carbon, what is not known, is the degree of carbon release from the decomposed fine roots in the soil and whether the net release of fine root carbon will be different over different time periods and under different treatment regimes. The results do not address soil carbon or the effect of forest management activities on total soil carbon because no reliable predictors were found that relate to the management treatments being considered.

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Average technology. Some data extrapolated from similar processes.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Questionnaires from 20 mills (17 companies) from the 20 states of Forest Service (FS) Northeastern (NE) Region. Hardwood sawmills were members of the Hardwood Manufacturer Association (HMA).
processDocumentation.restrictionsDescription: All information can be accessed by everybody.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: NE/NC = Northeast (NE) and Northcentral (NC) United States.  The 20 states are Connecticut, Delaware, Illinois, Indiana, Iowa, Maine, Maryland, Massachusetts, Michigan, Minnesota, Missouri, New Hampshire, New Jersey, New York, Ohio, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island, Vermont, West Virginia, Wisconsin.

exchanges.description: Wood Output = 572 kg, od basis. Based on an ovendry basis density of 627 kg/m3 and a moisture content (ovendry basis) of 9.6%. Conversion to board feet: 568 nominal board feet/m3 sawn and planed lumber.
